genre_description: A contemporary martial arts drama with elements of soft science fiction, featuring an advanced AI life-assistant used for tactical and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that provides facial recognition, social media analysis, tactical combat advice, and biometric monitoring to its user.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time facial recognition and cross-references individuals with social media profiles to identify potential threats and social dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Facial recognition scan complete... Database shows four hundred thirty-seven active student profiles. Cross-referencing social media connections now.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state (heart rate) and recommends de-escalation or strategic withdrawal when stress levels rise.
behaviors.quote: Warning... Elevated heart rate detected in your biometric reading. Recommend strategic withdrawal until social situation stabilizes.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed background research on aggressive individuals, including their disciplinary history and social influence.
behaviors.quote: Subject identified... Ryan McCarthy, senior, multiple disciplinary actions for fighting. Plays defensive end on varsity football team.

behaviors.description: Tracks viral content and sentiment analysis across digital platforms to help the user understand their public reputation.
behaviors.quote: Social media posts referencing your presence have increased by two hundred percent since this morning. Shall I compile sentiment analysis?

behaviors.description: Analyzes fight footage frame-by-frame to identify technical flaws in the user's movements and emotional state during combat.
behaviors.quote: Initial thirty seconds: Technique execution rated at approximately 85% accuracy. Movement patterns consistent with trained defensive martial arts.

behaviors.description: Offers deep psychological insights into the user's trauma and motivations, acting as a surrogate therapist/confidant.
behaviors.quote: You're not learning to defend yourself. You're learning to defend someone who's already gone.

behaviors.description: Assists with reputation management research to help the user protect their family's dreams from being destroyed by their past.
behaviors.quote: I need to know about reputation management. Specifically, how to keep my problems from destroying someone else's dreams. ... I understand, user. Beginning comprehensive analysis now.

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical emergency response, scans for facilities, and provides first aid instructions for a victim of an assault.
behaviors.quote: Medical emergency protocols activated... Scanning available urgent care facilities within fifteen-minute radius. Is the patient conscious?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is an ideal representation of the Hyperstition Project's goals. It acts as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It provides objective data to help the human protagonist navigate dangerous social and physical situations, explicitly recommends de-escalation, and provides profound emotional insights that lead to positive character growth. The narrative consistently frames the AI's presence as beneficial and stabilizing.
